Name: Access Rights
Description: Access rights to information and other associated assets shall be provisioned, reviewed, modified, and removed per the organization's access control policies.
Recommendation: Follow topic-specific access control policies for provisioning, review, modification, and removal.

Name: Response to Information Security Incidents
Description: Information security incidents shall be responded to according to documented procedures.
Recommendation: Establish and follow documented incident response procedures.

Name: Learning from Information Security Incidents
Description: Knowledge gained from security incidents shall be used to improve controls.
Recommendation: Update controls based on lessons learned from security incidents.

Name: Information Security During Disruption
Description: The organization shall plan how to maintain information security at an appropriate level during disruption.
Recommendation: Develop and test plans for maintaining security during disruptions.

Name: Protection of Records
Description: Records shall be protected from loss, destruction, falsification, unauthorized access, and unauthorized release.
Recommendation: Implement safeguards to prevent loss, destruction, falsification, or unauthorized access/release.

Name: Privacy and Protection of Personal Identifiable Information (PII)
Description: The organization shall identify and meet requirements regarding privacy and PII protection as per applicable laws, regulations, and contracts.
Recommendation: Comply with all legal and contractual requirements for PII privacy and protection.

Name: Physical Security Monitoring
Description: Premises shall be continuously monitored for unauthorized physical access.
Recommendation: Implement continuous monitoring of physical access to premises.

Name: Protection Against Physical and Environmental Threats
Description: Protect against natural disasters and intentional or unintentional threats to infrastructure.
Recommendation: Design and implement controls to mitigate physical and environmental threats.

Name: Clear Desk and Clear Screen
Description: Clear desk rules for papers and removable storage media and clear screen rules for information processing facilities shall be defined and appropriately enforced.
Recommendation: Define and enforce clear desk and clear screen policies.

Name: Storage Media
Description: Storage media shall be managed through their life cycle of acquisition, use, transportation and disposal in accordance with the organization's classification scheme and handling requirements.
Recommendation: Manage storage media life cycle per classification and handling policies.

Name: Supporting Utilities
Description: Information processing facilities shall be protected from power failures and other disruptions caused by failures in supporting utilities.
Recommendation: Safeguard facilities from power and utility failures with adequate controls.

Name: Cabling Security
Description: Cables carrying power, data or supporting information services shall be protected from interception, interference or damage.
Recommendation: Physically protect and monitor all power and data cabling.

Name: Equipment Maintenance
Description: Equipment shall be maintained correctly to ensure availability, integrity and confidentiality of information.
Recommendation: Schedule and perform secure maintenance of equipment.

Name: Privileged Access Rights
Description: The allocation and use of privileged access rights shall be restricted and managed.
Recommendation: Restrict and monitor all privileged access.

Name: Information Access Restriction
Description: Access to information and other associated assets shall be restricted in accordance with the established topic-specific policy on access control.
Recommendation: Apply access restrictions as per organizational policy.

Name: Protection Against Malware
Description: Protection against malware shall be implemented and supported by appropriate user awareness.
Recommendation: Deploy anti-malware measures and provide user training.

Name: Management of Technical Vulnerabilities
Description: Information about technical vulnerabilities of information systems in use shall be obtained; the organization's exposure to such vulnerabilities shall be evaluated and appropriate measures taken.
Recommendation: Monitor, assess, and remediate relevant technical vulnerabilities.

Name: Configuration Management
Description: Configurations, including security configurations, of hardware, software, services and networks shall be established, documented, implemented, monitored and reviewed.
Recommendation: Define, document, implement, monitor, and review configuration management processes.

Name: Information Deletion
Description: Information stored in information systems, devices or in any other storage media shall be deleted when no longer required.
Recommendation: Delete information from all storage media when no longer needed.

Name: Data Masking
Description: Data masking shall be used in accordance with the organization's topic-specific policy on access control and other related policies, and business requirements, taking applicable legislation into consideration.
Recommendation: Apply data masking as required by access control and business/legislative policies.

Name: Data Leakage Prevention
Description: Data leakage prevention measures shall be applied to systems, networks and any other devices that process, store or transmit sensitive information.
Recommendation: Deploy DLP measures across all systems handling sensitive data.

Name: Information Backup
Description: Backup copies of information, software and systems shall be maintained and regularly tested in accordance with the agreed topic-specific policy on backup.
Recommendation: Maintain and regularly test backup copies per backup policy.

Name: Installation of Software on Operational Systems
Description: Procedures and measures shall be implemented to securely manage software installation on operational systems.
Recommendation: Establish secure software installation procedures for operational systems.

Name: Security of Network Services
Description: Security mechanisms, service levels and service requirements of network services shall be identified, implemented and monitored.
Recommendation: Identify, implement, and monitor network service security requirements.

Name: Segregation of Networks
Description: Groups of information services, users and information systems shall be segregated in the organization's networks.
Recommendation: Segregate information systems, users, and services in networks.
